reviewText: Every bit as wonderful as I remember from my childhood, and the English subtitles means my non-Chinese speaking eight-year-old can enjoy it with me!
Awesome series, it explains a lot, can't wait to buy another!  Felix Wong is a great actor... Would like to see if his other TVB series could be made available to purchase, like "Young Wanderer"?
This is great!  Happy to see it with English captions.  Prompt shipping from Kona.
